file_content.text: Already we learn. Clan is reborn.
Soon I go to Trandosha, once all know Veneb is dead.
Veneb. Leader, teacher, dead... but you say he murdered? With Wookiee's help?
Dead are dead, Brek! What of us? Would be glory as Veneb's clan--now lost!
Veneb was a deceiver and murderer. Following him would only have led you down a dark path.
Veneb brought glory to no one.
Now, you can make your own decisions without Veneb manipulating you.
But you're free of him.
Decision of what? We had power, prestige, now nothing!
If you think glory means basking in someone else's achievements, you should re-examine your life.
What a pitiful ambition.
Qyzen, was... was great skill you show. Please, what clan is yours?
No clan. I travel with Scorekeeper's Herald.
None? But... you I would follow. To learn.
And I, to hear more of "Scorekeeper."
To follow... me? No! I am hunter, no clan leader.
They need guidance, Qyzen, and there is much you could teach them.
Go on. Take them as a clan.
I think you'd make an excellent clan leader.
Why not? You'd be good at it.
You teach and guide, Herald, not I. Is not for me to lead.
Think. You could teach them to hunt honorably, to serve the Scorekeeper.
Traditions must be preserved.
Perhaps the Scorekeeper is rewarding you for your devotion, and for stopping Veneb.
Maybe you've been blessed.
So now you see favor, in giving untried hatchlings to train? Hmph.
Clan of untried, ignorant hatchlings? Would prefer dozen hungry krayt dragons to hunt.
If you accept this as a duty, not a privilege, you won't be twisted by power, as Veneb was.
Reluctant leaders do best.
Is snare of words you make, Herald. But, is wisdom in them.
Very well. If any wish to learn, I no turn away. I serve Scorekeeper's Herald, but lead from afar.
You're helping these Trandoshans find a better future.
This is the right thing to do.
I hope is so, Herald.
Remember, they've just lost their leader. You need to restore their spirits.
Say something inspiring.
Will... will be hard path. But as lessons say, prey you lose today is nothing, when is greater prey tomorrow.
You have a pack of young warriors hanging on your every word. That's not so bad, is it?
Try to enjoy this.
You try, Herald, then tell if you enjoy.
First task is to live off land, here on Taris. Help brothers. Hone skills. I contact in few days.
We do, honored Qyzen.
I will stay; tell others of clan of happenings. When all are told, I obey.
Now, we go, Herald? Galaxy is scoured clean of Veneb, and I wish no more surprises.
If Qyzen does not wish you trailing after him, you must find your own destiny.
And his "no" is final.
Go to Trandosha. Tell Elders of happenings. Learn better.
Yes, honored Qyzen. We... we shall do.
I watch for others of clan, and tell of Veneb's death. When all are told, I will obey.
I thank you, Herald. Galaxy is clean without Veneb. Is time for us to go.
Is Qyzen Fess, and one he calls Herald? I am Brek. Set to watch for you.
I will fetch Veneb. Mind manners before Clan Speaker-to-be.
So, this is hunter who thinks himself wise. You interfere with Clan Speaker's becoming, Qyzen.
Is no interference, Veneb Drassk. I issue ghrajath for justice.
What justice? If you and soft friend have dispute, speak and leave. Is valuable time you waste.
I'd worry less about wasted time, and more about what the Trandoshan Elders will make of what you've done.
This is serious, Veneb.
Have "done" nothing but train clan!
Qyzen and I know how you've come this far, and it's not through hard work.
We know the truth.
Are you in a hurry to "remove" any last rivals?
You have more people to kill?
You killed hunters for Clan Speaker position, Veneb. Young hunter, Lek Svaal, is witness.
Killed? Haha! Taken blow to head, Qyzen? Words of tiny, glory-seeking hunter mean nothing.
You only have tiny hunter's word, yet you issue ghrajath. Think! Would Clan Speaker-to-be work with Wookiee?
So this is all a lie, but somehow you know a Wookiee was involved.
Nobody mentioned a Wookiee.
Given it was the perfect method of concealing your crimes, I have no trouble believing that.
Yes, to cover your tracks.
You hid behind a killer because you couldn't challenge your rivals fairly.
Only if he was a coward.
How is you know of Wookiee, Veneb? I said nothing of, nor did Herald.
Is... obvious. Yes. Because saying "Wookiee" makes for perfect lie.
But Veneb, this is Jedi. Can we ignore?
You forget Veneb's teaching, Brek? Is no one controlling us--not Scorekeeper, not Jedi!
What do you say? Turning back on Scorekeeper is becoming empty thing, lost!
You serve Scorekeeper, Qyzen. But she gives never, only demands. I teach my clan: we serve ourselves, we gain.
"Serving yourself" has got dozens of Trandoshans killed, and risked countless more.
At the price of many lives.
What of your score?
You don't care about points?
Can I eat score? Fight with? If no, then is what to me?
The Scorekeeper demands everything from you, and your efforts are never repaid.
I agree she gives nothing.
Is lie. I know blessing, favor of Scorekeeper.
Lies poison your clan, Veneb. More sicken if you rise to Clan Speaker. Will not allow!
You not allow? Who are you? Ragged hunter, who knows nothing past beasts and blades!
Loyal ones, silence Qyzen, and soft "Herald" of his!
Is clan business I have, soft thing.
